ComicInfo.Summary:
Christos Gage delivers a fiery return story to the world of the Crossed and the vicious alpha-infected, Smokey! He's found the smart girls, he's found a place to farm and Smokey is preparing to settle in for the long-haul. Can he pull off the first Crossed settlement? If the Crossed are the inevitable creeping doom, Smokey is the unavoidable fate waiting for you in a world of misery and woe.
Available with Regular & Torture Cover by Raulo Caceres, Wraparound Cover by Daniel Gete, Art Deco Cover by Michael DiPascale, C-Day Worldwide Cover by German Nobile, and Red Crossed Incentive Cover also by Caceres.
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Reg | Regular Cover | Michael DiPascale | 1 | TC | Torture Cover | Raulo Caceres | 2 | Wrap | Wraparound Cover | Daniel Gete | 3 | AD | Art Deco Cover | Michael DiPascale | 4 | CDW | C-Day Worldwide Cover (Puerto Rico) | German Nobile | 5 | RI | Red Crossed Order Incentive Cover | Raulo Caceres | 6 |
